name: A. Vasya and Socks
statement:
Vasya has pairs of socks. In the morning of each day Vasya has to put on
a pair of socks before he goes to school. When he comes home in the
evening, Vasya takes off the used socks and throws them away. Every -th
day (at days with numbers ) mom buys a pair of socks to Vasya. She does
it late in the evening, so that Vasya cannot put on a new pair of socks
before the next day. How many consecutive days pass until Vasya runs out
of socks?
